website_summaries.verdict: For dogs who prefer the taste and texture of canned food, this formula is an excellent choice.
pros: Dogs tend to love the texture in this high-protein canned food, as it uses bite-sized chunks
Extra flavor added in the sauce
Works as a stand-alone food for a high protein diet or as a topper for dry food to give a boost of protein
Perfect addition of vitamins and nutrients for overall health
cons: Canned food costs more than dry food
Kibble sizes are small for large dog breeds

customer_reviews.title: Just a warning
customer_reviews.text: My 3 dogs have been eating this for a few years. I ordered the 27 pack on Amazon because the larger packs are hard to find locally and we were traveling with 1 of the dogs. The dog traveling with us got very sick and often would not eat, and we wrote it off as the traveling. Then we found out the other 2 dogs at home were also sick with the same symptoms. We immediately stopped feeding them this food and they all recovered.
customer_reviews.author: Simply Custom Life

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice texture that seems more like a thick stew
customer_reviews.text: My dog is picky. He thinks that I am his personal chef and that he can opt out of eating what he does not want. He loves this food. It has a nice texture that seems more like a thick stew. The ingredients look to be things that are recognizable as meat, vegetables and grains. In general it seems to be a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: WilliamT

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these, he's a puppy and still teething so he has trouble chewing dry food. These are the perfect portion for 3 meals a day and one of the best values I've seen for individual portions of wet food.
customer_reviews.author: William Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Warning: you may not get 2 packs like the listing says
customer_reviews.text: Food seems fine, I only use it as kibble toppers. 1 can for 3 dogs. But I only got one 27-pack when the listing says you get two. Seller refused to send the 2nd pack but I got amazon involved and got half my money back. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Pets approve
customer_reviews.text: So I have an odd cat who prefers canned dog food, namely beneful, over any cat food. I've been doing the regular tubs but bought these on a whim. Both my cat and dog love them. There isn't any gravy, and very little juice so I add water. They both like the smaller pieces. This doesn't have the same look as the tubs, where you can see veggies in the tubs it's harder to tell what's in these.... but they like this better.
customer_reviews.author: TMG_FL

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES it!!!
customer_reviews.text: He has become very picky in his old age about what he eats! But adding this to his kibble makes him snarf his food down like I'd never fed him. Though the amount of 'vegetables' in it is miniscule at best! Really quite laughable!!! Don't think I will purchase again @ that price and questionable quality! There are better options given that there are virtually NO vegetables in the food!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Confused on the subscribe and save deal.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. My problem is the subscribe and save deal. Confused. The 1st two months I received 2 orders of the 27... That arrived as 4 cases. This month only 2. The price is the same and now I don't have enough food. Back to the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: C. Laws

customer_reviews.title: Gave both my dogs a VIRUS
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for years from the pet store, after getting my last order on Amazon, Both of my dogs got sick, Blood in stools, vomiting etc, symptoms are similar to parvo, after 1000 dollars in vet bills and having to give them both antibiotics, and to mention I have had to cleanup disgusting messes blood and diaherrea vomit and secreations I will never give my dogs this poison to eat again! I urge you to do the same...you may have had good experiences but when you get the bad one it will make you feel very bad!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Bob

customer_reviews.title: The quantity is wrong .. not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: When opening this box there were 2 cans missing and there should have been 30 cans in this box. Please replace them or I will return for a refund. Dissatisfied due to inappropriate count on item purchased
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars for this product Don’t purchase this if you love your pet(s)
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews but this time I have to..... This is a Horrible product I switched to this dog food to save money, the first time I fed my two Yorkie’s this dog food they both got very sick. Vomiting and diarrhea all night long and into the morning. It wasn’t until the evening time before they would eat anything else. I have never had a problem with Beneful products before however I only fed my dogs the dry food. If I could give zero stars I would. I’m very disappointed. Please don’t purchase this product there is something bad in it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Page-Griffin

customer_reviews.title: My McDreamy seems to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a mix-in for my McDreamy's dry kibble. He seems to approve. Plus, I like the fact that the ingredients are of a decent quality. Will def purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeromy Stone

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3.77lb female chihuahua who is very finicky in what she eats. I've tried several brands of wet dog food, and she flips her nose at them like she is trying to push them away from her. She will eventually break down and eat, but grudgingly. She has absolutely no hesitation scarfing this brand of dog food down. Will always be buying this brand of dog food for her in the future.
customer_reviews.author: LRC

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love This!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs Mini and Roxie love the canned Purina Beneful for small dogs! Obviously my dogs do not have Amazon accounts (because they don't have credit cards and I'm not able to guarantee they won't go online for lavish over-spending) so they asked me to pass along their review. ARF! RUF! ARF! ARF! RUF! RUF! Good work Purina!
customer_reviews.author: M. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Damaged/missing cans
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure what is going on here. I purchased the 30-can pack and it arrived just like this. Plastic bag twisted and taped with ONLY 26 can and 4 out of the 26 were dented like the above picture. I paid for 30 and can only use 22?! Disappointed customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Kadie Ertel

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food..honestly!
customer_reviews.text: My dog Princess..She loves this dog food...I tried all kinds of food..from the most expensive. This is her favorite.It is the right size.A couple cans a day and her dry food..some bones and she's a happy little dog!I don't know why but she loves this..I tried everything..so if your having a hard time..try this The texture is good ...smell..looks good ..ingredients can't go wrong.I'm just happy she's happy... I tried the subscription too ...delivery from Amazon..so far so good ..right to my door!..also try the Dingo bones..twists..my dog loves those too...also on Amazon...best deals.( got to treat our dogs good..best that we can... at least..love them)try it!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Who?

customer_reviews.title: Beware - This food made both of my Poodles Sick
customer_reviews.text: I had signed up for Subscribe and save. The first Batch that I was sent, seemed fine. The Following month, my dogs began throwing up and having Diarrhea. I have tried alternating days, feeding them once every two days as a treat. I have tried different flavors that were included and they all amount to the same. Something is truly wrong, I can't quite figure it out. But I will not be feeding them the rest of this product! Such a pitty, as it seemed like such a great snack for them. I am going to ask for a full refund, as I literally have almost a full box left.
customer_reviews.author: Fuse

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Prime to the rescue 👏👏
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr old, 20 lb.chorkie LOOOOVES these meals. I couldn't find the variety packs in any of the stores in my area (bites or medleys) . My supply was low and didn't want to buy anymore 3 pack chicken. Checked Amazon and Voila my search was over. They were delivered the next day,well packed &package. My pup and I are very happy with my order. 😃🥳👏
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My 10 pound chiweenie loves this food! It’s been an uphill battle trying to find her a food brand she truly enjoys. I have tried a variety of different brands and flavors and this one definitely fits the bill. The cans are perfect for one day. I give her half in the morning and half at night and she’s completely satisfied. I’m so happy I found the right food for her. The price is just right too, which is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: The cans are way to small doesnt even make a meal its about 2 bites. My dog ate the chicken flavor but the rest was so full of by products she wouldnt even touch it. None of my 5 dogs would and they love the dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mixing with dry dog food
customer_reviews.text: The wide variety of tastes in this selection plus the high quality of the food itself make this a meal our 15-pound bichon looks forward to eating.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for small picky dogs
customer_reviews.text: Our 13 year old Jack Russell is stsrting to lose her teeth and is pretty picky when it comes to wet dogfood. These have been perfect size wise and with flavor, she will eat all 3 flavors. We were buying the higher end dogfoods but she wasn't wanting to finish it all and was losing weight. Her weight is now picking back up and she looks forward to breakfast and dinner again.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Stay clear
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous bordering this food based on the other reviews of their dogs getting sick. I did anyhow and regret it! A lot of the cans came in dented but I thought the ones without dents would be okay. I was wrong- my dog is super sick after one can. Stay clear and buy from the store!
customer_reviews.author: B.M

customer_reviews.title: Our picky boys turned their nose up
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a great food for some dogs but our two picky boys just wouldnt eat them. The portion size was ideal because theybare seniors and eat very little at a single time. I love the real veggies in here, and my other 2 dogs (which eat everything) will happily munch these down. That said it didnt work for our intended purpose which was a good wet supplement in addition to their dry food for our senior boys. Overall I'm happy with the value.
customer_reviews.author: Stevonie

customer_reviews.title: My dachshund is finally happy with his dog food!
customer_reviews.text: At long last. My dachshund might think I'm feeding him 'human food', because he loves this stuff. I mean, it's practically what I have for dinner anyway, just a little more condensed...lol! I give this to him twice a day, both times mixing with some of his dry food (which he normally isn't a fan of) and he eats it all up. I've been switching between the three choices that it comes with to keep him from getting bored (chicken, salmon, beef). I'm so happy! and he is sooo spoiled. :) Overall, pleased with this purchase and will buy again. Thank you Purina!
customer_reviews.author: The Lil Bee

customer_reviews.title: Furbabies loves a big menu😊
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. My furbabies loves this food. 27 cans for about $17 and it’s delivered to your door. Couldn’t ask for anything more or better. I have 2 small bichon frise and if we don’t cook they each have 3 cans a day. So I don’t have to worry about them eating. They like this served over mash potatoes pasta/noodles French fried sweet potatoes or with rice. Yes my furbabies are very spoiled and they love good food and a large menu
customer_reviews.author: BoolynnlooTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My dogs live these!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs live these mixed flavors. I add them to their dry dog food so that they will eat it. They love the flavors, and they smell fresh and healthy, unlike alot of dog food. The only thing is that the cans are so small...only 3.5 oz. I think that they should be double that size. They're expensive for the quantity/size. I hope that this will improve. The product itself it great, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY WOOD

customer_reviews.title: My dogs didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Neither of my dog would eat this. My dog Baby died on Monday and I bought different types of wet food to try and get her to eat. Unfortunately she wouldn't eat any food and was not related to anything to do with this food. My other dog for whatever reason just passes by it like it's not even there and she eats everything including cat poop. The food looks great and fresher than most other brands I've bought. I won't buy again but definitely not the fault of the company.
customer_reviews.author: DevonColleen

customer_reviews.title: Old is new
customer_reviews.text: My fifteen year old doxie can't hardly contain himself in the morning knowing he is getting something goooooood in his bowl. Three flavors a surprise in every bowl of Purina Beneful Incrediblebites. Bright eye shiny coat full of spit and fire, old is new. Good value for great results, happy doggie here!
customer_reviews.author: boomer for hemp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have a miniature schnauzer and we started giving her this in the last six months. The portion size is just right for fifteen pound frame and she devours it. She would just graze when she felt like it with her previous food. Now that we’re giving her this, she is ready to eat all of it each morning, bouncing around and a little annoying until we give it to her. It’s also great for crumbling up any pill/medicine that the dog needs.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bohanon

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs and Cats like this product..
customer_reviews.text: This wet food variety pack has always come in a sturdy Amazon cardboard box. This one arrived in a mailer bag that soft clothes items come in..the box that the cans were in is a soft sided item and was squashed and distorted out of shape! Maybe with all the ordering Amazon is running short of sturdy boxes. The cans were not damaged. I was rather surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead5639

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Once I crack open the lid my dog comes running out of no where. My dog has little to no teeth left. I switched his food intake to wet food. He enjoys the meals he gets. I hear it up for about 15 seconds in the microwave to give it that warmth. If you need this type of food on a monthly basis I recommend doing a subscription on amazon to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy lagoa

customer_reviews.title: Good... but!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice meals my puppy eat just the chicken flavor she doesn’t eat just to be next to me and thinking I’m leaving her she follows me everywhere her anxiety is at the top limit that she doesn’t eat if I’m not close and sometimes she even forgets it.. well she eats almost nothing she ate 3 cans out of the box the rest I gave it away there’s no food she likes like before when she was smaller . Sadly
customer_reviews.author: Yanelque

customer_reviews.title: Purina Beneful Wet Dog Food Looks and Smells Yummy
customer_reviews.text: This dog food looks like real food, not some mush. I can see veggies in it and there are chunks of meat. All the flavors smell delicious and my pups jump for it. I mix it with their kibble. Most retail stores sell these in 12 pack but on line here I can get a 27 pack which is much better. Well worth it just to see those happy faces when I open a can!
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Corgi Lady

customer_reviews.title: Awful on dog's digestion
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what they put into this stuff, but it is really really bad for my dog's digestion. I have to throw the product away. Unusable. I will not only never buy this product again, but never buy anything sold by the company again.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonG

customer_reviews.title: Maggots
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very picky, but she will eat these. She inhales them, so I assume they taste great to her. Update (07/17/2020): I found maggots in one of the cans today after she ate most of her food...
customer_reviews.author: LAmoongirl

customer_reviews.title: Good portion size for small toy breeds
customer_reviews.text: My terrier mix loves these but the cans are SO tiny I have to feed her two. These would be perfect if the cans were a little bigger. Still hunting for something she loves in bigger portions.
customer_reviews.author: MAR

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I get this for my new dog, Angel. She loves it. That makes me so happy. It also does not cost as much as some dog food that I have tried that Angel did not like. The product was great but delivery was not. It was delivered unsealed and covered with something that felt like liquid soap. Luckily the food containers were sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Goins

customer_reviews.title: Broken box and missing cans of food.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product once before with no problem. The amazon boxs was fine but the actual product box was broken and missing 4 cans of dog food. Update: Recieved new box withing 2 days and did not have to return original box . Even tho this new box was also broken , there wasnt any cans missing.
customer_reviews.author: Daynne

customer_reviews.title: No more meat putty
customer_reviews.text: You know the can of tan meat putty that we are used to giving our dogs that comes out of the can with a and holds it shape. Kinda like spam... well no more.... This is actual recognizable food. You can see the rice, chicken, veggies etc. I'm truly impressed. So is my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad to find this during the lock-down. I split one can among 3 small dogs, using it as an enhancement to their dry food. They love it. I don't know if they appreciate the variety each morning but I think it makes their meals more interesting. I didn't have any damaged cans, and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby4

customer_reviews.title: Not a healthy dog food.
customer_reviews.text: Read what is really in this product. Dogs refused to eat it and now I know why. Very poor quality food. Threw out the entire case after ready all about it.
customer_reviews.author: Peg C

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could find these flavors individually
customer_reviews.text: My little guy tolerates the beef, likes the chicken and is all over the salmon. I've tried to find just the salmon but no joy so far. These are packed well and the cans are attractive and easy to open. I usually use half a can with two handfuls of dried dog food mixed in. My peke is 15 lb.
customer_reviews.author: KLouthan

customer_reviews.title: Our boy LOVES it & he doesn’t get sick anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Best food I’ve found for our furry family member that doesn’t make him sick or cause some type of skin allergy. And if you check the ingredients, it’s as good or BETTER than the often prescribed by their vet, food called ‘EN’ (also made by Purina) for dogs with sensitive stomachs. It’s a WIN/WIN for us... he LOVES it and we love that it’s good for him too!
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: economical soft dog food
customer_reviews.text: this is so convenient especially for my 10 year old shiz tzu with fractured mandible and can only tolerate to eat soft food it is perfect size for him
customer_reviews.author: M Magsino

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the cost. Dachshund loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My little dog loves this food and it is healthy for her. Portions are very small, but they are sold as a food for small dogs so that is to be expected. I'm so glad we found this food after going through several varieties that she either didnt like or that made her tummy upset.
customer_reviews.author: Shady77

customer_reviews.title: My baby LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited I ordered this food for my little shih tzu he LOVES it. He is a very picky eater and will only eat one brand of treats plus he has Cushing disease so his appetite is not like it use to be but my baby ate 2 cans of the salmon today. I will certainly order again
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Picky eaters eat this!
customer_reviews.text: Pomeranian and Yorkie both very finicky eaters. Nightmare finding food they will eat consistently. This has been the answer! Plenty of variety and nutrition in this, bowls now empty in record time.
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I have a chihuahua mix with italian greyhound, he's the most finicky dog I have ever had. I have gone thru many different dry dog foods, but once I mixed this wet food with a small amount of the kibble, he loved it. I will continue to serve him this food.
customer_reviews.author: 1Time

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has always been a very picky eater, thus struggling with gaining weight. However, these have helped him gain weight! He loves them! He will no longer graze his food but he eats the entire plate right then and there!! I also mix these with his kibble every time (:
customer_reviews.author: linda f.

customer_reviews.title: Made dog sick
customer_reviews.text: So the portion size and all is good my dog liked it, it made her sick though so I researched the food and found out it's had a lot of recalls and makes a lot of dogs sick, I did a return with no problems and got a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Healthy safe
customer_reviews.text: I found out this food is on the good list from our vet. My dogs love it, plus it has vegetables in it.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to dry dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are super picky eaters and will absolutely turn their noses up at straight dry food. I'm sure they would love to eat exclusively wet food, but I want to keep costs down by buying large bags of dry food. After much trial and error, we finally found a system that works. My dogs are happy to eat their dry food if I just mix in a spoonful of the Beneful wet food. A little goes a long way and my dogs and I are really happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rysso-DeMaggio

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect size for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: These cans are small but you'd be surprised when you get the contents out. It is packed and unlike some other dog foods that look like gelatin (such as little Caesar's), these are real meat cut into tiny tiny pieces perfect for my yorkies and any small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Starian

customer_reviews.title: Good product poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a good product for my small dog; he seems to really like it, but the packaging for shipment was terrible. What would you ship a thin cardboard box in an even thinner plastic bag? My package arrived round, not square. The bag had been tossed around enough that the box inside was busted. I opened the bag and poured the loose cans onto my counter. This would have gotten a better review had the packaging been able to keep the box intact.
customer_reviews.author: benderman

customer_reviews.title: What a mess delivered
customer_reviews.text: I buy this item as my small dog loves the food. The package arrived an absolute mess. Cans all dented, box demolished inside package meaning someone packaged the item that way. I open the item and the cans are thrown in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: jyosko

customer_reviews.title: Toxic
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. Both of my dogs have had seizures after eating this food. I didn’t realize there was an issue with this brand in the past. Toxic ingredients in food cause liver failure, seizures, and death.
customer_reviews.author: Mere

customer_reviews.title: Good dog foods.
customer_reviews.text: My dog love it so much! I will continue buy this wet dog foods from Purina beneful for her, i put on a small plate, and warm it up in microwave for 12 seconds, made sure warm not hot, she really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I  usually buy from store, but glad amazon delivers ((:
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are suuuuuuuper picky on what they eat. They have a bad habit of eating food that we eat and my dad is the blame for that terrible habit. So they almost never ate dog food and would wait until everyone would eat dinner so that they could eat. I tried many different types of dog food but they just never liked it. LUCKILY my mom found this brand and decided to try it out. My dogs can't get enough!!! IM SO HAPPY. They love it so much its scary.. BUT they're happy and enjoy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a case of Purina beneful, I figured since they eat other Purina products they would like this I mixed it with their other can good and then just benefit even my puppy who will eat anything would only take a bite and walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste crosby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small/median sized dogs
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good value for 27 cans of wet dog food. This is the first canned food that my Shiba puppy ate and she loves it. You can see that the food within the cans looks natural and not overmixed and blended.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Siris

customer_reviews.title: Dog Waits Patiently For This One
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were cheaper but my dog loves these best out of all food products that are moist that I have tried. He even waits for me to put this on top of his dry food before he starts eating.
customer_reviews.author: vette2375

customer_reviews.title: dog's likes taste
customer_reviews.text: Per Mauley (my dog) this is a great product and just the right size to be able to add this to her dry food. She is a 130 pound labrador and I have to keep her "treats" as small as possible
customer_reviews.author: Jude Keesey

customer_reviews.title: Missing cans
customer_reviews.text: Although this product is set up on a subscription and we are usually satisfied with it's condition upon arrival, this time the box was taped together poorly as it had busted and cans were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda McKenney

customer_reviews.title: Even big dogs love this as a mix in to dry, or as a topper
customer_reviews.text: My hound gobbles this stuff up right away. He loves it. Tail wagging. Big satisfied smile on his face after he completes his meal. They claim it is for small dogs, But also big dogs will happily eat it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My pup eats it!
customer_reviews.text: I cant tell you flavor (I personally don't eat it!) but my dog who is very very picky seems to eat it most of the time. LOL. I dont use it as a full meal but add dry food with it.
customer_reviews.author: shopalot

customer_reviews.title: Broken cans and Damage package
customer_reviews.text: Not the first time that my box arrived all broken and some cans are damage. The food is ok is the same of what you can get at the stores and my dog likes it. But the fact that is the second time I received a box in that condition makes me upset.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Nom Nom!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I originally got these because our puppy was getting tired of eating kibbles so I wanted to supplement with wet food! These portions are smaller the I expected but I supplement with additional snacks. I put these babies on a paper plate and microwave for 10s and my sammie loves it! He always get so excited when he hear the microwave goes off! Definitely have to restock soon!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Le

customer_reviews.title: Healthy for the animal children.
customer_reviews.text: My Pomeranians are over 12 years and have lost many teeth therefore their main diet is can food now. They are family to me and I want to keep as long as I can. It is a healthy diet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My dogs won't eat.
customer_reviews.text: Evidently the stuff taste bad. Granted my dogs are pickey, but cats would not go near the stuff.
customer_reviews.author: P. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not approved by my fur baby
customer_reviews.text: I guess my review is a little bias, my pup didn't like them, he ate some of the chicken flavored at first but then refused to eat, the beef and salmon were a no from day one
customer_reviews.author: nayeli

customer_reviews.title: Every is just right
customer_reviews.text: Right flavor choices, right portion sizes, right varieties. My dogs absolutely love this food, especially the picky eater... finally something she will go for in a big way.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this food!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really love this wet food. I mix it with their dry food to ensure they eat because they can be a little picky sometimes. Portion size is similar to other brands. But they seem to enjoy the taste on this one a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Bajo2256S

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The can is very small do not recommend to eat directly in a can (even my chihuahua T cup who has a little mouth) The flavor is good ( I guess!!! ) because my dog love it
customer_reviews.author: Nattie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It was super cheap for the amount of food i bought. The only thing was the box was completely destroyed but it was made out of cheap cardboard so it’s understandable. The food was fine and everything was there. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Alo

customer_reviews.title: It arrived a day early!
customer_reviews.text: Vert fast service. Especially considering what is going on. My mother in law is so grateful that her Pug won't have to eat people food for two days now. Always good to get points with the mother in law.
customer_reviews.author: Big Boss

customer_reviews.title: Dog excited every time I open the can
customer_reviews.text: The portion is a little much for my small dog. But they don’t have an issue eating every bit of it. I haven’t notice any issues arise after changing my dog to this good. Seems like a good product and I don’t really have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Corey & Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Food She Will Actually Eat!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A food that our Picky Yorkie will eat! She loves this food. Since she is only 6 lbs., this is a perfect size meal for her. Of course she eats snacks also!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ann

customer_reviews.title: One of the better quality dog foods
customer_reviews.text: I mix this in with my dogs other food. They seem to enjoy the natral experience of this dog food. I really like that you can tell it has real veggies in it.
customer_reviews.author: William Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4lb poodle
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for my senior toy poodle who has had to have all of her teeth removed. She's a pickup eater, so the variety of flavors keeps her interested.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Just like the kind at Wal-Mart
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the box at Wal-Mart & the same price too. Just so much better having it delivered. Especially at this crazy Coronavirus time.
customer_reviews.author: Pammy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chopped up for little dogs or medium.
customer_reviews.text: These little cans are great, little pieces chopped up, not packed food. Our dog loves it. Highly recommend trying it... we have a 50# beagle and we mix it with his dry food and he eats every last bite
customer_reviews.author: Big Glass Friday Gal

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs like, so we buy
customer_reviews.text: We been using incredibites for a while now and our dogs actually look forward to their dry food (we mix this in). We will continue to use as long as it works. 3 flavors in carton.
customer_reviews.author: DaleM

customer_reviews.title: Cans Almost All Dented
customer_reviews.text: I have to wonder if these small multipacks are where Beniful is sending its dented cans. I used to see 2 or 3 per box but now its 8 ouf of 10 that are dented. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ponto Mom Carlsbad CA

customer_reviews.title: My yorkie actually eats all of it!!
customer_reviews.text: It us soft enough for his aging teeth and tasteful & he eats it all gone. I do wish the flip up tab was easier to use for arthritic fingers. I have to use a coffee measuring metal handle to do that task.
customer_reviews.author: MeemsSC

customer_reviews.title: Did not react well with my dog's digestion but he loved the taste
customer_reviews.text: My dog really liked these, but his body didn't. I tried mixing some pumpkin with it to ease him into it, but ultimately we had to change foods. You could try a smaller pack if you're testing out new flavors (we're donating this to the shelter near us).
customer_reviews.author: mj8998

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deal
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog who won’t take her meds without having them crushed and hidden in wet food. We have used beneful products since she was a pup. I was thrilled to find such a fantastic deal on the wet food which allows my 13 year old pup continue to play and enjoy life
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ba Germaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Portions & Price point
customer_reviews.text: My little Terrier-Chihuahua (?) mix dog loves this food, and I love the portions and the price. Very quickly shipped. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: ARC

customer_reviews.title: So small!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is small and barely eats. These cans of food are so microscopic that she requires two cans to actually be nourished. I will not be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ann Meade

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the tiny cans, they are easy to store, and since I have 2 dogs, they eat half each of the can, and done!!! I will defantly order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Texture is important
customer_reviews.text: My little dog likes this food probably because it has good texture,she won't eat mush. I'm glad I can get it from Amazon,it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: vr

customer_reviews.title: Small and Expensive
customer_reviews.text: My dog ate it but it was only 3 ounces per can.Twice a day x one can. This is the only brand She will eat . She weights 25 lbs
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to write a review for other pet owners. Please do not give this to your dog! My jack chi got extremely sick from eating these. At first he seemed to like the food. But the next day he was shaking and sick... then the diarrhea started. He now has bloody stool and is headed to the vet. Nothing else in his diet or lifestyle has changed except for the addition of this food. Do NOT buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toothless Chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: We feed these to our toothless Chihuahua and she loves them. They are small bites, small enough to be almost like she chewed them herself.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Happy dogs
customer_reviews.text: There's enough selection to keep my dog happy. I mix the wet food with their dry food and they gobble it right up.
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: Little canned benefuls
customer_reviews.text: I like the small size, I use it to add some moisture to my pet's dry food. She is happy with this arrangement.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this- I add it to her dry food and that’s the only way I can get her to eat dry food. You can see the vegetables in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT TOO BAD FOR GAS
customer_reviews.text: MY LITTLE FRENCHIE LOVES THIS. NOT TOO BAD FOR GAS. I HAVE HAD TO STOP WITH SEVERAL BRANDS . BECAUSE OF THE FLATULENCE PROBLEM! I FEED HER 1/4 CUP DRY WITH 2 TABLESPOONS OF THIS INCREDIBLE BITES TWICE A DAY. SHE WAITS PATENTLY UNIT THE INCREDIBLE BITES IS MIXED INTO THE DRY.
customer_reviews.author: Tattered Fox

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them so far, I expected this to last me a month tho, not less than two weeks, the cans are super small , I have a 12 pound dog and I have to give him 3 cans a day
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy food for our Chihuahua.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't personally tasted this food but our baby does, we switch her food every other day for a healthy 'diet'. From dry to wet, she seems to enjoy this procedure.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: My pup hates it
customer_reviews.text: My pup will not eat any of the flavors.. He is picky but never had him turn down food before when he was hungry.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen V. Thompson

product_meta.title: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Variety Pack| Size:(27) 3 oz. CansFeed your little dog the big flavors he loves while also providing proper nutrition with this Purina Beneful IncrediBites adult wet dog food variety pack. The bite-sized and meaty chunks in each recipe are chopped up purposefully with his small mouth and teeth in mind. Ingredients that include real farm-raised beef, chicken or salmon help create protein-rich options he'll crave meal after meal. Each recipe offers 100% complete and balanced nutrition for small-breed adult dogs, including 23 essential vitamins and nutrients. Support his overall well-being with a combination of high-quality ingredients that deliver a healthy food choice that also tastes good. He'll find flavor in each bite, and you'll find the enjoyment that comes from serving your canine pal food that's good for him. You and your dog should never have to compromise on quality or taste. When you choose the delicious flavor options found in this Purina Beneful IncrediBites variety pack, you don't ever have to.
feature_bullets: Twenty-Seven (27) 3 ounce Cans - Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack; IncrediBites
Made with real beef, chicken or salmon
Includes real ingredients you can see
Touch of sauce adds flavor to each bite
Provides 100% complete and balanced nutrition for adult dogs
